pages.text: 0 CRAMER’S KITCHEN SIMPLY ELEVATED CUISINE FOOD IS LIFE Welcome to Cramer's Kitchen, where dining becomes an elevated experience! We are open for both public reservation through Resy or private group dining via the contact form below. Come in and indulge in the culinary delights of Chef Owen’s (Owner of Cramers Cuisine) seasonal tasting menu, featuring 5+ courses, with the option to complement your experience with our curated selection of wines. At Cramer's, we strive to source our ingredients as locally as possible to provide not only the best quality, but the most sustainable. Cramer’s Kitchen was opened as an extension of Chef’s many years of private chef experiences and catering. At Cramer’s, you will find yourself stepping into his “home” rather than yours. *Our Chef's Tasting Menu aims to preserve Chef Owen's original culinary vision while accommodating common dietary preferences: vegetarian, pescatarian, gluten-free, shellfish allergy, and nut allergy. KITCHEN + Restaurant $125 / person Seasonally rotating 5-7 course prix fix menu. See our current menu below in our Instagram slide! Private Dining $200 / person Private Group Dining. All inclusive experience for up to 20 people. Food, wine, and beer included. ! Inquire here catering Contact for Pricing For catering, visit our sister company Cramers Cuisine ! site here Email Address Sign Up Thank you! community + Follow the Kitchen And NOW OPEN… Nook Tiny Cafe & Market is co-owned by Chef Owen Bernstein, which features specialty coffee during the day, and a wine and charcuterie bar in the evening. Open now at 267 Rutledge in downtown Charleston. Follow along at or online at @nooktinycafe.com nooktinycafe.com
